text:
@GovAbbott This kind of social distancing & wearing masks by @VP? Doesn't he head up the #Coronavirus task force? Not following @CDC guidelines shows great leadership.
Good placement on the two POC. #RIPGOP https://t.co/zopFjZ84Pz
